content:
I am a PhD student in Computer Vision and Cognitive Science at Ecole Normale Supérieure de Paris and INRIA. I am working on unsupervised learning of intuitive physics, under the supervision of Emmanuel Dupoux, Ivan Laptev and Josef Sivic.
In 2017, I co-founded Milvue, where we develop algorithms for automated medical diagnosis from x-ray images.
Contact me at: ronan [dot] riochet [at] polytechnique [dot] edu

title: Ronan Riochet
Occlusion resistant learning of intuitive physics from videos
IntPhys: A Framework and Benchmark for Visual Intuitive Physics Reasoning
